summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3999 for the improvement of Olive Street and East Olive Street, from Westlake Avenue to Bellevue Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by installation of a street lighting system; under Ordinance No. 48599, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund. .
